Articles.Content: Pol is the most underrated planet or moon in the game, even less than dres, so let’s show some support, build space stations, circumnavigate, try and count all of the spikes, colonize, turn pol into a spaceport, and many, many more
This idea for missions has been moved to Mission Ideas.

Spaceport on top of Pol's highest mountain...
Named "Kero Fin"

I appreciate Pol very much, it was the second and last moon of Jool that I've landed on yet, just it and Vall. Yet, I still don't have enough experience or time to fly an entire network of colonization thingies. Mainly because playing on PS4 is challenging.
